verses.verse: And Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> each <S%H376><s%> of them his censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> therein <S%H2004><s%>, and laid <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon <S%H7126><s%>, and offered strange <S%H2114><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which he had not commanded them <S%H6680><s%>.
And there came forth <S%H3318><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from before Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and devoured <S%H398><s%> them <S%H4191><s%>, and they died before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, This is it that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I will be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them that come nigh <S%H7138><s%> me <S%H6440><s%>, and before all the people <S%H5971><s%> I will be glorified <S%H3513><s%>. And Aaron <S%H175><s%> held his peace <S%H1826><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Mishael <S%H4332><s%> and Elzaphan <S%H469><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%> the uncle <S%H1730><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7126><s%>, Draw near, carry <S%H5375><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>.
So they drew near <S%H7126><s%>, and carried <S%H5375><s%> them in their coats <S%H3801><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>, as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and unto Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%>, Let not the hair of your heads <S%H7218><s%> go loose <S%H6544><s%>, neither rend <S%H6533><s%> your clothes <S%H899><s%>; that ye die <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H7107><s%>, and that he be not wroth with all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>: but let your brethren <S%H251><s%>, the whole house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, bewail <S%H1058><s%> the burning <S%H8316><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath kindled <S%H8313><s%>.

And ye shall not go out <S%H3318><s%> from the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, lest ye die <S%H4191><s%>; for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is upon you <S%H6213><s%>. And they did according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Drink <S%H8354><s%> no wine <S%H3196><s%> nor strong drink <S%H8354><s%>, thou <S%H1121><s%>, nor thy sons with thee <S%H935><s%>, when ye go into the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, that ye die <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H2708><s%>: it shall be a statute for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>:
and that ye may make a distinction <S%H914><s%> between the holy <S%H6944><s%> and the common <S%H2455><s%>, and between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%>;

and that ye may teach <S%H3384><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> all the statutes <S%H2706><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto them by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and unto Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> that were left <S%H3498><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> that remaineth <S%H3498><s%> of the offerings <S%H4503><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> it without leaven <S%H4682><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>; for it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>;

and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, because it is thy portion <S%H2706><s%>, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%>' portion <S%H2706><s%>, of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>: for so I am commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And the <S%H8573><s%> wave-breast <S%H2373><s%> and the <S%H8641><s%> heave-thigh <S%H7785><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> in a clean <S%H2889><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, thou <S%H1121><s%>, and thy sons, and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> with thee <S%H2706><s%>: for they are given as thy portion, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%>' portion <S%H2706><s%>, out <S%H5414><s%> of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of the peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

The <S%H8641><s%> heave-thigh <S%H7785><s%> and the <S%H8573><s%> wave-breast <S%H2373><s%> shall they bring <S%H935><s%> with the offerings made by fire <S%H801><s%> of the fat <S%H2459><s%>, to wave <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and it shall be thine <S%H1121><s%>, and thy sons' with thee <S%H2706><s%>, as a portion for ever <S%H5769><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> diligently <S%H1875><s%> sought <S%H1875><s%> the goat <S%H8163><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and <S%H8313><s%>, behold, it was burnt: and he was angry <S%H7107><s%> with Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and with Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> that were left <S%H3498><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Wherefore have ye not eaten <S%H398><s%> the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, seeing it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>, and he hath given <S%H5414><s%> it you to bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>?

Behold <S%H2005><s%>, the blood <S%H1818><s%> of it was not brought <S%H935><s%> into the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> within <S%H6441><s%>: ye should certainly <S%H398><s%> have eaten <S%H398><s%> it in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, as I commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Behold <S%H3117><s%>, this day have they offered <S%H7126><s%> their sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> and their burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and there have befallen <S%H7122><s%> me such things as these <S%H398><s%>: and if I had eaten the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> to-day <S%H3117><s%>, would it have been well-pleasing <S%H3190><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>?
And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3190><s%>, it was well-pleasing in his sight.
